page.title: 03CLUBS
page.content: There are almost fifty different clubs and organisations in the town which serve the community, young and old alike. {The Womens' Institute, The {Townswomens' Guild, The Royal British {Legion(Womens' Section), The Rotary {Club, St.Bart's, The Old Cornwall {Society, The Girl Guides, The {Brownies, The Boy Scouts, The Scout {Cubs,}and many others. {The Social Club, The Community {Centre, and The Conservative Club,}are licensed to sell alcohol. The elderly people enjoy the help and assistance of many organisations and transport to and from their homes is usually available to enable them to attend social functions.
